item.title: Wave Electra
item.dc:creator: Good Student
item.description: Thrilling and electrifying. Wave Electra is here with a 1.81” HD display and Bluetooth calling on-the-go. Keep up with your health with 100+ sports modes that accurately track your activity and keeps you in a tip-top shape. If you’re bored, start gaming directly from your smartwatch with whack-a-mole and 2048 built-in. Wave Electra smartwatch supports IP68 Dust and Water Resistance and a massive 7 days of battery life for you to be unstoppable in achieving your fitness goals.
item.content:encoded: Thrilling and electrifying. Wave Electra is here with a 1.81” HD display and Bluetooth calling on-the-go. Keep up with your health with 100+ sports modes that accurately track your activity and keeps you in a tip-top shape. If you’re bored, start gaming directly from your smartwatch with whack-a-mole and 2048 built-in. Wave Electra smartwatch supports IP68 Dust and Water Resistance and a massive 7 days of battery life for you to be unstoppable in achieving your fitness goals.
